settings.heading: How It Works
settings.text: At Table & Twine, we believe customers should enjoy the satisfaction of cooking a savory meal without having to spend time grocery shopping or preparing ingredients. That’s why we go one step further than our competitors.
settings.text2: We don’t deliver plastic-wrapped ingredients to your doorstep and expect you to do the rest. No, our talented chefs prepare up to 90% of your meal, from mincing to measuring to marinating. Once you receive your Raleigh dinner meal kit, all that’s left to do is the finishing touches and you’ll have dinner in less than 15 minutes.

settings.title: Browse Seasonal Meals
settings.text:
Our chefs partner with local vendors to source the freshest ingredients for our weekly menu. With Table & Twine, you can order single-serving dishes or family-style meals to feed a crowd. 
We can make your holidays more cheery! We also offer holiday packages! Spend less time in the kitchen and more time with friends and family with our chef-prepared meals. We offer packages for Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and more!

settings.title: Place Your Order
settings.text: To provide a truly personalized culinary experience, our chefs make each meal fresh to order. You can place your order by 11:59pm before any of the designated order days to receive your meals the following day, delivered straight to your door.

settings.title: Untwine & Dine
settings.text: Our chefs handle the technical and tedious aspects of cooking so you don’t have to! Just set aside 15 minutes to put the finishing touches on your restaurant-quality dish.

settings.section_heading: How To Shop With Table & Twine
We can help you take the hassle out of the holidays!
settings.section_text: If you dread hosting holiday get-togethers, order a chef-prepared meal kit from Table & Twine. Our easy-to-prepare dishes minimize prep and clean-up time, giving you more family time. We offer packages for Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and more!

settings.title: Chef-Prepared Recipes
settings.text: Each week, our talented culinary team curates fresh, new recipes inspired by regional fare and international cuisine.

settings.title: Meals Ready in 15 Minutes
settings.text: Say “goodbye” to long hours in the kitchen and “hello” to a 15-minute prep time. Since our chefs handle all the shopping and chopping, you can focus on what matters most: sharing savory meals with the people you love.

settings.title: Flexible Serving Sizes
settings.text: With Table & Twine, you can order delicious dishes in serving sizes of one, two, and four. But you can always adjust the quantity of serving sizes to accommodate more dinner guests.

settings.title: How does the ordering process work?
settings.text: For Raleigh and The Traingle customers, meals must be ordered by 11:59pm two days before your desired delivery date.

settings.title: What is your cancellation policy?
settings.text:
Raleigh customers must cancel orders no less than two days before their scheduled delivery date to receive a full refund with a 10% cancellation fee. If you cancel your order less than 48 hours before, no refund will be offered.

To limit food waste, we will happily deliver your meal to a friend, neighbor, or co-worker who can accept the order in your absence.

settings.title: Can I place an order over the phone?
settings.text: No. All orders must be placed online through our website. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us with the Table & Twine by phone or email.

settings.title: Do you offer substitutions or changes to meals?
settings.text: At this time, we cannot accommodate substitutions or changes to meals.

settings.title: What’s included in the price?
settings.text: Each price listed for meals and desserts is for a single serving. Each kids’ meal will feed one child. pacckages, appetizers, and snacks have varying serving sizes that can be found in the product description.

settings.title: How do I prepare the meals?
settings.text: Scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions.

settings.title: Is there a delivery fee?
settings.text: Yes, delivery fees range from $6.99 to $12.99.

settings.title: What areas do you deliver to?
settings.text: We currently deliver to most locations in the Triangle area. Type your zip code in the bar at the top of the page to see if we deliver to your area.

settings.title: How often does delivery occur?
settings.text: We delivery on Tuesday and Thursdays between 12pm and 5:30pm.

settings.title: What is the order cutoff time?
settings.text: Meals must be ordered by 11:59pm two days before your desired delivery date. Order by Sunday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Tuesday. Order by Tuesday at 11:59pm to receive your meal on Thursday.

settings.title: How far in advance can I order?
settings.text: Menus are available up to seven days in advance.

settings.title: When are new menu items offered?
settings.text: Our chefs offer new meals, packages, bistro meals, appetizers, and desserts every season.

settings.title: Is there a minimum order size?
settings.text: We require a minimum order size of $40 for delivery.

settings.title: I would like my delivery left somewhere other than my front door (e.g. side door). Can I send specific delivery instructions?
settings.text: Yes, we can accommodate specific delivery needs.

settings.title: How is delivery handled if my order contains alcohol?
settings.text: During the online checkout process, you must enter your birthdate to complete age verification. At delivery, someone age 21 or older must be present to receive the package.

settings.title: How long do meals keep?
settings.text:
- Our prepared dinner meals, summer seasonal offerings, and kids’ meals keep for 3 to 5 days refrigerated.


- Bistro salads keep for up to 3 days.


- Desserts keep for 3 days. Frozen take and bake cookies keep for up to 1 month.


- Buffalo chicken dip, jumbo lump crab dip, and roasted red pepper hummus with vegetables keep for 3 to 5 days refrigerated.


- Local cheese and charcuterie, cheese and fruit plate, and guacamole and corn tortilla chips keep for 3 days refrigerated.


- Energy bites keep for 5 days refrigerated, or up to 2 months frozen. Egg cups keep for 3 to 5 days refrigerated. Smoothies keep for up to 1 month frozen.


- Drink mixes keep for 5 to 7 days refrigerated.

settings.title: How does Table & Twine promote sustainability?
settings.text:
Recycling & Upcycling
At Table & Twine, we’re committed to reducing our impact on the earth. You can help us by:

- Packing picnics or lunches in our insulated bags


- Re-freezing our ice packs for coolers


- Using our plastic containers for leftovers


- We’ll recycle our tote bags, ice packs, and cleaned plastic containers for you! Just drop them off at our local kitchen or leave them on your doorstep on your delivery day.



Less Food Waste

Table & Twine addresses food waste by pre-measuring all of the delicious ingredients used in your meal.

Smart Packaging

We’ve broken up with styrofoam! Instead, we use biodegradable products like paper boxes, bamboo trays, and more.

Heating Instructions

Our heating instructions are paperless. Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging, pour a glass of wine, and start cooking.

settings.title: How will my food stay cold?
settings.text: We use insulating packaging with ice packs to ensure freshness.

settings.title: What if my household avoids specific foods?
settings.text: We offer a variety of allergy friendly meal kit options in Raleigh.

settings.title: Do you offer specific plans for vegetarians or other dietary options?
settings.text: Not quite. However, we have plenty of plant-based dishes on our website.

settings.title: I have a discount code or gift card. How do I use it?
settings.text: You can use your discount code or gift card at checkout by simply typing the code or link you received into the “Gift or Discount Code” box and clicking “Apply.”

settings.title: What is your refund policy?
settings.text: We do not offer refunds for orders after the order cut-off time.

settings.title: What are your Mobile Message Service Terms & Conditions?
settings.text: Please click here for our Mobile Program Terms of Service.
